table.name: Neutral Planar Encounters
table.caption: Neutral Planar Encounters
rows: {@dice 1d6} {@creature thri-kreen} looking for a way back to their Material Plane home
A mysterious being who communicates via 1 {@creature cranium rat squeaker|MPP}*
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Society of Sensation Muse|MPP|Society of Sensation muses}* undertaking increasingly daring feats
1 {@creature smoke mephit} carrying challenges between archmage rivals
{@dice 2d12} {@creature commoner} {@book petitioners|MPP|0|Petitioners} fleeing {@dice 1d4} {@creature Farastu Demodand|MPP|farastu demodands}* and 1 {@creature kelubar demodand|MPP}*
1 {@creature cuprilach rilmani|MPP}* on an assassination mission
1 {@creature githzerai futurist|MPP}* with a warning about a character's future
1 {@creature flameskull} claiming to be the famed planar explorer Morte
1 {@creature ancient time dragon|MPP}* (50 percent chance the time dragon is from the past, 50 percent chance it's from the future)
